name: Anastasia Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 1 week in September. We had a great holiday and really enjoyed this hotel and its grounds. The staff are super friendly and helpful they are a credit to the hotel we never had had service like it.
reviews.title: Friendly 3star hotel
Lovely staff
reviews.text: The pool and grounds are well maintained and very relaxing. Our room was right at the back of the complex and was very dark but we didnt complain only had it for a week and hardly spent any time in it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really enjoyed our stay in the Anastasia and the staff were wonderful and so helpful.
reviews.title: Wonderful relaxing holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool was clean and not to busy and there was always someone there to help if needed.
reviews.title: Another Great 2 Weeks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only minor criticisms are lack of a kettle in the room (they will loan you one for a Euro a day) and cheap loo roll but I'd happily stay here again.
reviews.title: chilled holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: great place to go and chill out in a nice friendly hotel .the staff are very friendly which seems to pass on to the guests and most will chat at mealtime or at the bar .the only thing i can say wrong is that there is a busy road outside but there is a underpass to get you to the other side .the food was very good and plenty of it
reviews.title: chill out

reviews.text: We visited the Anastasia with our family for two weeks in September. The staff are exceptional. Diane, the receptionist showed us to our rooms when we arrived and went out of her way to bring us a kettle and some cups and even brought us some milk so we could have a cuppa. Laura, the children's entertainer is lovely and a credit to the hotel. I have nothing but praise for all the happy friendly staff who are so pleasant and helpful.
reviews.title: WONDERFUL ANASTASIA

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are kept spotlessly clean with the towels and bed linen changed regularly. The food was probably the best I have had whilst on holiday. The gardens and the pools are immaculate. In fact I enjoyed my stay at the Anastasia so much that I have already booked to come back next year.
reviews.title: great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: had a great holiday in this hotel staff very friendly food great rooms cleaned every day great for familys and children .there was entertaintment every nite the owner michael was very nice he was there every day till late and he took part in some of the entertaintment and laura the childrens entertainer was great hope to return soon.
reviews.title: wow another great week
Fantastic hotel
reviews.text: just returned from another week at the hotel anastasia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 1 week - room was basic, but big and clean, apart from top headboard - dust overlooked by the cleaners !
reviews.title: Nice hotel - Basic and clean

reviews.text: Bed very comfy and shower although very small, water pressure was good !
reviews.title: Lovely Holiday

reviews.text: No kettle in room, and if you want one from the hotel will cost you 1 euro a day lol - my advice is take one with you !
reviews.title: Another fantastic stay at Anastasia!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also you have to pay to use the safe in room 15 euros a week!!! Got to say the safe should be free, like other hotels in the world i have visited !
reviews.title: Second Visit, over way too soon

reviews.text: Half board is good - lots of food to choose - hit and miss sort off - some you like and its your taste, some not ! Only complain it's some dishes are very oily, so had to give it a miss !
reviews.title: very personal approach

reviews.text: just got back on tuesday from a 2 week family holiday. the hotel was fab the room lovely and clean all the time. the staff are the hardest working ive ever seen and always have a smile on their faces. laura runs the kids club also eve entertainment she is fab works so hard even after a accident on her moped she still kept going ! dianne in reception is also a star always on hand to give advise about the resort and further a field also. beautifully maintained pool and grounds with fruit trees and flowers . i would defo go back to this hotel and have priced up for next year ! yet another satisfied customer !!
reviews.title: the best family holiday ever

reviews.text: Stayed here with my husband from 18th Sept until 25th Sept.
reviews.title: "Amazingly a 3 star"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had e mailed the hotel prior to my arrival with my room request (I do this on every holiday) Despite the courteous reply the hotel was fully booked, And therefore my request may not be met. It was, we were given room 116 and it was exactly what I wanted. First floor, with view of pool, pool bar and glimpse of sea.
reviews.title: best holiday ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Immediately on my arrival I noted how clean this hotel is. From the grounds. Pool area and rooms. Which is always a must of mine, therefore we felt immediately we would like this hotel.
reviews.title: been there, done it n when can i go back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I didn't find the beds uncomfortable. And slept well on clean white sheets.
reviews.title: Can't fault the place

description: Welcome to the Hotel Anastasia at the North East of the island of Crete. Situated in Stalis, a place made for couples and families and only 450m away from one of the most beautiful beaches on the island, Hotel Anastasia offers you the possibility of an unforgettable summer holiday. Fully renovated in 2006, Hotel Anastasia is a modern, cosy, family-run complex, surrounded by trees and greenery and consists of 13 different buildings in a total area of 8,500 square meters. High quality accommodation, an unrivaled range of services and facilities, combined with traditional Cretan hospitality make Hotel Anastasia the best choice for your holidays.
